description: doc/effective_go: don't use ALL_CAPS for variable names.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Thu, Nov 8, 2012 at 10:39 AM, Rob Pike <r@golang.org> wrote:

> Why not?

We generally discourage names to use mixed caps instead of all caps
(http://golang.org/doc/effective_go.html#mixed-caps), and this example
that was demonstrating someone else has led at least one person
astray.

not thrilled but i won't say no. maybe goRoot instead of goroot, if
you're going to be all pedantic about stuff.

-rob

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=61f28ec84870 ***

doc/effective_go: don't use ALL_CAPS for variable names.

R=r, dsymonds
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6826070

subject: code review 6826070: doc/effective_go: don't use ALL_CAPS for variable names.
